caption.title: Average individual investment and standard error of the mean (95% CI) by treatment over the game evolution.
caption.p: In both equal treatment and unequal treatment, participantsâ€™s contribution decreases along the game. The differences between the two treatments are not statistically significants (MWU Two-Sided, U: 50.0, P: 0.97).
